title: Run Facebook ads for product launch
description: Setup and manage a comprehensive Facebook ad campaign, including audience targeting, ad creative development, budget management, and performance tracking to ensure a successful product launch.

title: Build a portfolio website
description: Need a personal portfolio website using React and Tailwind CSS. The site should be responsive, showcase my projects effectively, and include a contact form.

title: Write 10 product descriptions
description: Write 10 SEO-friendly product descriptions for e-commerce listings. Each description should be engaging, informative, and optimized with relevant keywords to improve search engine visibility and conversion rates.

title: Create a social media marketing plan
description: Need a detailed social media marketing strategy for Instagram and Facebook growth. This includes content planning, hashtag research, engagement strategies, and performance metrics.

title: Write blog posts for tech site
description: Write 2 articles about AI tools and web frameworks for a tech site. The content should be well-researched, engaging, and provide valuable insights for a tech-savvy audience.

title: Design graphics for Instagram posts
description: Design 10 high-quality graphic templates for a digital agency's Instagram page. The designs should be visually appealing, on-brand, and optimized for Instagram's specifications.

title: Design a logo for a tech startup
description: Create a minimalist and modern logo for a SaaS brand. The logo should be unique, memorable, and visually represent the company's innovative approach.

title: Fix bugs in existing MERN app
description: Resolve API errors and UI bugs in a MERN stack dashboard. This involves debugging server-side issues, front-end rendering problems, and ensuring smooth application functionality.

title: Design a landing page UI
description: Create a Figma design for a SaaS product landing page. The design should be user-friendly, visually appealing, and optimized for conversions, incorporating modern UI/UX principles.

title: Create REST API with Express.js
description: Develop a robust REST API with Express.js for a freelance job board application, including user authentication, job posting, bidding, and messaging functionalities.

title: Develop mobile app UI in Flutter
description: Need UI screens for a food delivery app developed in Flutter. The design should be intuitive, visually appealing, and provide a seamless user experience across different mobile devices.

title: Optimize WordPress site speed
description: Improve load time and fix core web vitals for an existing WordPress site. This includes optimizing images, caching, minifying CSS/JS, and addressing server-side performance issues.
